text:
Ma Yun (,; born 10 September 1964), known professionally as Jack Ma, is a Chinese business magnate, investor, and philanthropist. He is the co-founder and executive chairman of Alibaba Group. As of August 2018, he is one of China's richest men with a net worth of US$38.6 billion, as well as one of the wealthiest people in the world.
Ma announced he will retire from Alibaba on 10 September 2018 and focus on educational charity work.
